Reviews.Title: Good for price but better is available.
Reviews.Author: Jon N.
Reviews.Content: The description was completely accurate. What was delivered was exactly what was specified. I purchased this as a home security system and although it serves its purpose, the cameras turn browns and greens purple. Since the Cameras are CMOS, it reads colors differently. If these were ccd cameras, easily 5 stars. Did catch people breaking into cars in the early morning hours with these camera though.

ProductInfo.Features:
ZMODO KDF8-BARBZ4ZN-1TB 8CH H.264 DVR with 1TB HDD & 4 CMOS 480TVL Outdoor Cameras with 24 IR LEDs
DVR FEATURES: H.264 Hardware Compression, 500GB HDD Installed & Configured, Signal System: NTSC / PAL, Video Input / Output: BNC 8/BNC 1, Video Output: VGA, Audio Input / Output: RCA 4/BNC 1, Recording Mode: Continuous/ Scheduled/ Motion
Remote Access: LAN or IE Browser, Plug-n-Play, Supports Remote View via Smart Phone & 3G mobile with each of these systems: Android, iPhone & iPad IOS, Symbian, Windows Mobile
Camera FEATURES: 1/4" Color CMOS Image Sensor, 480 TV Lines Horizontal, 3.6mm Lens, Signal: NTSC, Night Vision Min. Light: 0 Lux (IR On), IR Irradiation Distance: up to 65', Operation Temperature: -25°F~122°F, Weatherproof: Yes, Power: 12V DC, Mount: Wall, Video Connector: BNC, Power Connector: RCA 12V DC
Package Includes: (1) ZMD-DD-SAN8-1TB (DVR-H9118V1TB) Security DVR,1TB Hard Drive Installed, (4) ZMD-CBR-BBS23NM (CM-C22623BG) Outdoor IR Security Cameras, (4) 60ft CCTV Power + Video Cables for Security Cameras, (1) 12V/1500mA Single Power Supply for Security Cameras, (1) 1-4 Splitter Cable for Security Cameras, (1) IR Remote Control, (1) User's Manual
ProductInfo.Name: ZMODO KDF8-BARBZ4ZN-1TB 8CH H.264 DVR with 1TB HDD & 4 CMOS 480TVL Outdoor Cameras with 24 IR LEDs
